text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates and Query Failures>
We are investigating increased API error rates and query failures in the US-EAST-2 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates and Query Failures>
We have identified the root cause of the issue that was causing some customers to see increased API error rates and query failures in the US-EAST-2 Region and we are working towards recovery.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased API Error Rates and Query Failures>
Between 9:51 AM and 11:24 AM PST we experienced increased API error rates and query failures in the US-EAST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
